markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=224)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 268 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) who are usually Small and typically have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
name: Kobold
